title: 3-Day London Itinerary

activities.description: Explore the iconic Buckingham Palace and watch the Changing of the Guard.
Stroll through the park and enjoy the serene atmosphere and beautiful views of the city.

activities.activity: Visit the Houses of Parliament and Big Ben
activities.description: Explore the historic area of Westminster and admire the architecture.
Enjoy traditional British cuisine at a nearby pub.
Take a leisurely walk along the Thames, stopping by the London Eye and the Tate Modern.
Explore the vibrant market and dine at one of the many restaurants.
Explore ancient artifacts and exhibits from around the world.

activities.activity: Morning Coffee at a nearby café
activities.description: Relax with a cup of coffee and enjoy the museum's surroundings.
Enjoy a leisurely afternoon in London's largest park with scenic views.
Wander through the beautiful gardens and visit Kensington Palace.
Experience the lively nightlife with a diverse range of dining options.
End the day with a popular West End musical or play.
Browse through fresh produce, gourmet foods, and unique gifts.
Enjoy a leisurely breakfast at one of the charming cafés near the market.
Spend the afternoon shopping at London's famous shopping street.
Take a break for lunch at a nearby restaurant.
Explore the quirky and vibrant market filled with eclectic shops and street food.
Experience a trendy evening with a choice of diverse restaurants and bars.

tips: Wear comfortable walking shoes as you'll be doing a lot of walking.
Purchase an Oyster card for easy access to public transportation.
Make restaurant reservations ahead of time for popular places.
Check the weather forecast and pack accordingly.
